item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

well i downloaded a shopmaker and it says [code][Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 2641) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg] //@@@@@THIS IS WHAT I HAVE TO DO BUT IDK HOW TO EDIT .cfg files…@@@@@@@@
42 ~Dragon_Shop~ 1 1 2552 1 2552 1 6739 401400234 5698 100000 4587 875679 4585 38921999 4087 48921999 3140 61346513 1149 10236513 1187 32154321 1216 90000 1231 90000 1249 302544 1305 767981 1434 135421 1377 304213 1434 135435

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
2641 3253 3436 0 0 0 0 0 1 Shop_that_sells_Dragon_items_and_stuff

[/code] but it says to add this to shops.cfg but idk how to edit it and stuff but i can get on it…
Oh yeah if this helps my source is fr33sc4p3. Hope someone can help me
